epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.connection

Class IOConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.connection.IOConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockingConnection, PipelinedConnection

    public abstract class IOConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Encapsulates a connection opened. This is subclassed by two classes, namely BlockingConnection and PipelinedConnection
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade
